entries.title: Biden Administration Clamps Down on China’s Access to Chip Technology
entries.description: The White House issued sweeping restrictions on selling semiconductors and chip-making equipment to China, an attempt to curb the country’s access to critical technologies.

entries.title: Under New Order, Europeans Can Complain to U.S. About Data Collection
entries.description: The executive order, signed by President Biden, brings the United States and the European Union closer to a broader deal on the transfer of digital data.

entries.title: Under New Order, Europeans Can Complain to U.S. About Data Collection
entries.description: The executive order, signed by President Biden, brings the United States and the European Union closer to a broader deal on the transfer of digital data.

entries.title: Elon Musk’s Hidden Twitter Motives and a Metaverse Meetup
entries.description: Is the $44 billion dollar Twitter deal actually for real this time? Our hosts disagree.

entries.title: 24 Hours in the Metaverse Version of Facebook Was Surprisingly Fun
entries.description: Every hour of the day and night with the gamers, parents, insomniacs, preteens and aspiring comedians who are the earliest adopters of the immersive, three-dimensional internet that Mark Zuckerberg has bet the future of his company on.

entries.title: Biden Visits IBM to Promote Investments in U.S. Semiconductor Production
entries.description: President Biden traveled to Poughkeepsie, N.Y., to connect a $20 billion investment by IBM to the bipartisan bill meant to spur production of critical microchips.
